forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 40F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 37F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
